title: Clue/Cluedo: Classic Edition
notes: Steam English reviews are Very Positive (87% of 2,055). SteamDB shows 84.28% positive across ~3k reviews; strong sentiment.
raw_comment: Detective game. Can be played single player, online or locally. 6 local players. 📱 6 phones as controllers using an app. 🖥️ Phones and shared screen.
